did.abstract: Handwritten notes by an employee of the City of New York Department of Plant and Structures Bureau of Design relating to the construction of various components of the Flushing Bridge. The notes are comprised of diagrams, dimensions, and financial data, and date from 1938 and 1939.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Flushing Bridge, which spans the Flushing Channel in the New York City borough of Queens, opened in 1939.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Handwritten notes by an employee of the City of New York Department of Plant and Structures Bureau of Design relating to the construction of various components of the Flushing Bridge. The notes are comprised of diagrams, dimensions, and financial data, and date from 1938 and 1939.
